name: RemoveRepoFromTeam
description:
Remove a repository from a GitHub team within an organization.

Call this tool to remove a repository from a specific team in a GitHub organization. The user needs to be an organization owner, team maintainer, or have admin access to the repository. This action will only unlink the repository from the team, not delete it.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization. It is not case-sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team name to identify which team's repository link should be removed. This is required and case insensitive.

value_schema.description: The slug of the team name.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository to remove from the team. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team name.

value_schema.description: The slug of the team name.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
